issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I am having Windows Phone memory issue:

I have created an app, but it is crashing in between.
Also while navigating between different controllers(cached in memory),
at some other times, the content is not loaded...and empty screen displays.
at some other instances, it gives : 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Application Error
Runtime Error: unknown Exception* 
Appcelerator When your app is packaged for final distribution, no error screen will appear.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*DOUBT*
Please provide Memory management solution for *WINDOWS PHONE*
Something like a Windows phone alternative for android syntax : 
      
{code:java}
android:largeHeap="true"
{code}

Thanks

comments.body: Hello, Can you provide a sample test case demonstrating the issue. You should follow this guide: http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Managing_Memory_and_Finding_Leaks
